duties_responsibilities.duty: Gain industry experience and network with other professionals in the field.
Work on meaningful projects that contribute to advancements in eye health.
Develop an understanding of the software development process for medical devices.
Participate in product development lifecycle, including requirements refinement, testing, troubleshooting, and project tracking.
Create effective data management & storage techniques for faster & easier access to data.
Collate and pre-process multiple independent data sources to enable AI prediction models.
Perform literature search and review novel approaches to support algorithm development.
Develop and integrate product security processes, technologies/tools into Alcon products.
Collect and analyze system data and clinical parameters for research and analysis.
Review clinical study reports and summarize findings for project management and process improvement.

education_certification.credential: Must be pursuing at least a Bachelors level degree in Data Analytics, Computer Science / Engineering, Software, Information Technology, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Vision Science, Computational Data Analytics, Cybersecurity, Information Security and Systems Engineering or related major.
